english.segment1: *Don't Do It Again is the actual name of the song. *It's Never Enough is the name of the album
english.segment2: . Can you hear yourself?. A saner man would run from the things. Coming out your mouth. Your voice is all barbed wire and it stings
english.segment3: Dont do it again, girl, no. Dont get all crazy. And begin, girl, to think it over. Yeah its all inside your head
english.segment4: Get your head checked out. Because youre psycho psycho. So when youre all worked out. Wont have to worry about you being loco
english.segment5: Dont do it again, girl, no. Dont get all crazy. And begin, girl, to think it over. Yeah its all inside your head
english.segment6: As the days go on. And you say, Dont worry. Dont complain, were all the same. But youre crazy
english.segment7: Dont do it again, girl, no. Dont get all crazy. And begin, girl, to think it over. Yeah its all inside your head
